why.heading: Why XCHscan.com ?
content: XCHscan is the leading Block Explorer, Search, API and Analytics Platform for Chia blockchain.

XCHscan provides a wide reach to Chia blockchain community and users at large. XCHscan provides a platform for projects, businesses and teams to reach out to potential users via sponsored content on our web pages.

advertising.heading: Advertising formats
advertising.content: Get your message in front of millions blockchain enthusiasts. Our sponsored contents are designed to be cohesive with the site’s user experience.

formats.heading: Home Page Banner Ad Sponsorship
formats.content: Prominently create brand awareness and user retention with banner ads on XCHscan's homepage. Creatively promote, engage user and increase "eyeball" reach.

formats.heading: Header Text Ad Sponsorship
formats.content: Reach users by reaching to them individually with CPM sponsorship. Your sponsored ad text displays in a non-intrusive and clean manner on the top of XCHscan’s pages.
